tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter

Class SvgGridPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter.SvgPainter
      • tud.tangram.svgplot.svgpainter.SvgGridPainter

  • public class SvgGridPainter
extends SvgPainter
    Paints a grid and axes to the SVG Document. Leaves the legend untouched.
